node.title: All in One
node.descriptions: I compare these to a single parent who becomes a father and a mother combined for the children

node.title: Attractive
node.descriptions: Not because of the outward appearance but because of the conscience of a good heart

node.title: Consistent
node.descriptions: She knows her worth and doesn’t act kindly towards those who are hypocritical or inconsistent with their words or actions

node.title: Loving
node.descriptions: Despite being exhausted, he continues to love you no matter how difficult or heavy his heart feels

node.title: Nurture
node.descriptions: My explanation for my work is comparable to my mother whose care inspired me to do this

node.title: Organized
node.descriptions: Most of the time, it is the women who are organized with things

node.title: Responsible
node.descriptions: She is her own fighter. She is fiercely independent and is proud of the fact that she can take care of herself. She does not need a man to look after her and lean on. She leans on herself and takes responsibility for her life.

node.title: Lost Soul 1
node.descriptions: "It's the lost souls that lay the foundation for a better tomorrow, because those beings are not afraid to be lost, they are not afraid to fail, in the pursuit of something greater, something grander, than to just survive no different than the dogs do on the street" (Goodreads)

node.title: Swings And Roundabouts
node.descriptions: A situation in which different actions or options result in eventual gain or loss.In other words, Everything balances out in the end.

node.title: Torschlusspanik
node.descriptions:
Most of the people didn't value the important things around them.I think this world needs more darkness.
Because once you have been in the dark, you're going to appreciate everything that shines.

node.title: Cross Breeding
node.descriptions: Essential elements of nature and varieties of species, intersect in its natural dominions... their plight creates greater and diversed natural structure and new life for continued survival of living things.

node.title: Saying Goodbye But Never Forgotten
node.descriptions: In both difficult and fun times, our friends are always with us. So many memories that are shared every time we gather and spend moments together. These are recollection of experiences that we will bring until we become older. It is an unforgettable part of life to have really friends who may come and go, but will leave a lasting impact to who we are.

node.title: Reptalialism: Queen IX
node.descriptions:
Erwin Pineda is a Filipino artist whose passion for drawing was discovered at a tender age. 

This series is named "Reptalialism" because of Pineda's belief that reptiles and humans share a similar trait - perverse pleasure from seeing others brought low.

node.title: Ennui
node.descriptions: Feeling of listlessness and dissatisfaction arising from a lack of occupation or excitement.

node.title: Brain or Heart
node.descriptions: Decision making becomes harder when brain and heart are present. Most of the time we use our heart to rule out the brain or vice versa. The main subject is headless...creating space, freewill to place which is better on top. Is it the heart or brain?

node.title: The Hero
node.descriptions: A hero who hides with someone else and does not need to identify with many people and a hero who has a heart that is willing to help the needy without any change.

node.title: Old Structures: The Reminiscence of The Past
node.descriptions: Preserving and protect our national and cultural heritage. In this art piece, the different variation of the old stone houses called "Bahay na Bato" are shown. It embodies the character of the urban landscapes and the heart of Filipino Life.

node.title: A Heart That’s Pure
node.descriptions: Smile from your heart; nothing is more beautiful than a woman who is happy and Nothing is contented. A girl pure of love, true respect and appreciation towards one another and to herself.
